snippet: The match between Brazil and Mexico is expected to bring crowds and fanfare usually reserved for the World Cup.
abstract: Olympics Roundup; the men's soccer match between Brazil and Mexico is expected to bring crowds and fanfare usually reserved for the World Cup.
lead_paragraph: The match between Brazil and Mexico is expected to bring crowds and fanfare usually reserved for the World Cup.

headline.seo: Men’s Olympic Soccer Final Is Drawing Attention
headline.main: Usually a Sideshow, Men’s Soccer Final Is Drawing Attention
